roleset.name: tolerate, put up with

example.name: they pretty much all look like this
example.text: Even with mutual funds, [the little investor]-1 continues *trace*-1 to tolerate high fees, high commissions and poor performance, while index-fund managers slowly amass a better record with lower fees, lower commissions and less risk.
example.arg: high fees , high commissions and poor performance

roleset.note: Member of Vncls admire-31.2, allow-64. Updated by Julia, 10/2010.

frameset.note: Frames file for 'tolerate' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. 'Put up' doesn't include this roleset.
